insert into result_hour (project_id, code, rec_time, data_value, state, remarks,sys_time) values (#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dataValue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},now())
mapper.update: update result_hour set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rec_time = #{recTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, data_value = #{dataValue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sys_time=now(), remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, project_id, code, rec_time, data_value, state, remarks from result_hour
